column4: heres a question... I had to stop using the restricted nvidia drivers on my laptop using the go 6600 because I attempted to upgrade and had problems.  Now I have official nvidia legacy drivers installed which are working fine.
Question is how can I access the appearence tab to control turning compiz on and off?
every time I attempt to change from none and custom it asks me to install restricted video drivers
if you are in gnome I believe you can right click and get to the display properties
